creatureData.name: Felidar
creatureData.description: They can be trained and ridden. Felidars that make it through their first year of life can easily live to see a hundred years more.

creatureData.name: Annis Hag
creatureData.description: The child-eating hags were the undisputed queens of barbarism, combining the wicked cruelty of dark fey with the unbridled strength of evil giants

creatureData.name: Elder Tempest
creatureData.description: Heavy precipitation in the form of either rain or snow falls there, causing the area to be lightly obscured.

creatureData.name: Gargolyle
creatureData.description: These creatures had mastered the ability to stand motionless for long periods of time, which added to the fa√ßade of their statue-like appearance.
